headline.print_headline: Prado, in Bosch Dispute, Blames Dutch Museum
headline.main: Prado Explains Decision to Withhold Works from Bosch Show

snippet: The Prado said it rescinded the loan of the works because the Dutch museum, by planning to display the works “as ‘not by Bosch,’” had “failed to comply with the conditions of the loan agreement.”
abstract: The Prado said it rescinded the loan of the works because the Dutch museum, by planning to display the works “as ‘not by Bosch,’” had “failed to comply with the conditions of the loan agreement.”
